title: Parametric Symplectic Jet Interpolation
authors: Rafael B. Andrist, Gaofeng Huang, Frank Kutzschebauch, Josua Schott
abstract:
We prove a parametric jet interpolation theorem for symplectic holomorphic
automorphisms of $\mathbb{C}^{2n}$ with parameters in a Stein space. Moreover,
we provide an example of an unavoidable set for symplectic holomorphic maps.
